== Cheruthazham (CT) (627221) ==

Cheruthazham (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 32.17 sq. km. and harbouring 7074 households with total population of 29348 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 535 km. Male population is 13571 and female population is 15777. Scheduled Caste population is 1565 and Scheduled Tribes population is 41. Census Location Code of the town is 627221<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 36 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 119 km. Railway station is at Pazhayangadi at a distance of 5 km.
